3139.verse: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.

3140.verse: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners

3141.verse: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.

3142.verse: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.

3143.verse: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.

3144.verse: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.

3145.verse: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.

3146.verse: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.

3147.verse: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.

3148.verse: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."

3149.verse: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

3150.verse: Who sees you when you arise

3151.verse: And your movement among those who prostrate.

3152.verse: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

3153.verse: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?

3154.verse: They descend upon every sinful liar.

3155.verse: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.

3156.verse: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;

3157.verse: Do you not see that in every valley they roam

3158.verse: And that they say what they do not do? -

3159.verse: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
